category.name: Active Workspace.Massive Model Visualization
category.category_description: Active Workspace Massive Model Visualization preferences

preference.name: MMP_PERCENTAGE_OF_DELTA_TO_PURGE
preference.preference_description: This preference controls the percentage of Massive Model Product (MMP) structure delta files to purge when MMV_delta_collection_accumulation_limit is reached. Minimum value for this preference can't be less than 10% and maximum value should not exceed 100%. In case of wrong value set to this preference then system to consider 100% as default purge limit.
